title: D5 Jungler LFT/Creating team
body:
Hey all, I have played since s2 on and off and was plat 1 in S3, didn't really play much in S4 so decayed to gold. Have recently started playing seriously again, I have climbed from gold 3 to Diamond 5 since the start of the season and am looking to join a team that has hopes of being competitive or create a team and start training, I am a 25 year old working professional but my passion has always been about gaming. I played in the open tournament when Oceania servers were released and got to top 20 with a last minute pick up team.

If your considering wanting to create/join a team, only plat 2+ would be considered.
Anyways, any questions feel free to add me in game and we can talk some things over.

replies.body: Just got D4 tonight, still looking.
why set your standards so low. lel. don't be modest. diamond plus ez
